column4: I'm newb!! Just wondering, if i eg. make chmod -R 777 /path/to/directory and change file permissions, do these permissions 'stay' if I transfer files to ftp server?
Okay, I tried to make 777 in a files, when i transfer the file to ftp using filezilla and right click for permissions, it tells me: numeric value: xxx
it depends but most times it does not... is your ftp server linux based
cant you change on the webserver
